about_the_game:
Blaze into glorious victory with the Red Skies DLC. Used by soldiers throughout the war, particularly in battles between January and February 1942, the Soviet Airborne uniform was worn by soldiers to help them fight in even the most adverse weather conditions.

This downloadable content contains:
Airborne Overalls: (Available for Soviet Officer, Rifleman, Anti-Tank, Engineer, Machine Gunner, Automatic Rifleman, Assault, Medic, Support, Sniper and Spotter roles)
Airborne Cloth Cap: (Available for Soviet Officer, Rifleman, Anti-Tank, Engineer, Machine Gunner, Automatic Rifleman, Assault, Medic, Support, Sniper and Spotter roles)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features mature content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

Realistic depictions of War, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
